Package Trees

Class AbstractTree<T>

java.lang.Object
Trees.AbstractTree<T>
Type Parameters:
T - wildcard to support any datatype
All Implemented Interfaces:
Tree<T>
Direct Known Subclasses:
RedBlackTree
public abstract class AbstractTree<T> extends Object implements Tree<T>
An abstract model of any BST
